Title: ELSA-2023-12989: microcode_ctl security update (IMPORTANT)
Description:
[2:2.1-73.19.0.3]
- update 06-6a-06 to 0xd0003b9 {CVE-2023-23583}

[2:2.1-73.19.0.1]

- enable early and late load for 5.4.17-*
- enable early loading for 06-4f-01 caveat
- remove no longer appropriate caveats for 06-2d-07 and 06-55-04
